welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dakota Ridge, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore all that our city has to offer and enjoy your stay here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport is a modern and spacious facility, with a variety of amenities and services available for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, Jeffco Airport offers a separate terminal with luxurious lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Erie Municipal Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
